FlowDefinition.description: U.S. Fellowship. Triggers on stages: Not Qualified and Notified Send Invite for Interview 1 Waitlist - Interview 1 Invite to Interview from Waitlist Not Moving Forward from Waitlist Hold on Matching - Wave 2 (when candidate has submitted considermes) Move to Wave 2 (finalizing stage name) Offer Sent Host Dropped Out After Confirmation
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Fellow Application - US Fellows - Immediate Send
